title: Varthana Finance secures $10 mn debt from BlueOrchard Finance
description: Bengaluru-based Varthana Finance, backed by ChrysCapital, secures $10 million in debt from BlueOrchard Finance, a global impact investor. Varthana specializes in providing loans to affordable private schools and students to improve access to quality education. The funding aims to expand support to a larger network of schools, advancing efforts for inclusive education
